document_data.mainbody:
'''''Pools of Cerulean''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Tomb of Annihilation|Tomb of Annihilation]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Chult]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 17{{th}}- to 20{{th}}-level characters. It is the second part in the ''Broken Chains'' series.

{{Quote|''The Land of Ash and Smoke. Once a hellish landscape of volcanic activity, now a nightmare region that hosts one of the scattered Soulmonger fragments. The fragment’s burgeoning power attracted the attention of the Red Wizards of Thay and, thankfully, adventurers who are willing to risk life and limb to keep the fragment from these vile arcanists. Can you reach the fragment before the Red Wizards make off with it? The hunt is on.''|}}
